ai-anya-e0605n0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-anya-e0605n0:4_0: He who lives in the world of the Lord of Awakened One, having fulfilled the incomparable Bodhisattas see the Bodhi (Tree), having summoned the excellent Bodhi (Tree), like the Lord of the Bodhi (Tree).
ai-anya-e0605n0:5_0: Having attained the virtues of the Bodhisatta, the Lord of Gods,
ai-anya-e0605n0:6_0: Having made an end of suffering, he rejoiced in suffering.
ai-anya-e0605n0:8_0: Having destroyed the Victor’s mind, having cut off the whole world,
ai-anya-e0605n0:9_0: then the Supreme Man, the Supreme Man, the Supreme One, who went to the Bodhi tree, surrounded by the auspicious Snakes,
ai-anya-e0605n0:10_0: The Happy One, after hearing the fruit of the Holy One, listening to me,
